item.title: Are Yuranus Infrastructure Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Yuranus Infrastructure Ltd's latest results show a dramatic revenue increase of 5,766.67% to ₹1.76 crores, but the company still posted a net loss of ₹0.40 crores, indicating ongoing operational challenges and negative profitability metrics. Overall, while revenue growth year-on-year is positive, the company's financial health remains concerning. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Globus Spirits Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Globus Spirits Ltd's latest results are positive, showing a remarkable net profit growth of 1,456.74% year-on-year, despite a slight revenue decline. The company has improved its operating margin significantly, indicating strong operational efficiency and a focus on profitability. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Are Elecon Engineering Company Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Elecon Engineering Company Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show a net profit decline of 33.06% year-on-year, with compressed operating margins at 19.79%, indicating significant profitability pressures despite a strong balance sheet. The company faces operational challenges that may require strategic intervention to improve future performance. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Globus Spirits Q3 FY26: Strong Margin Expansion Drives Profitability Surge
item.description: Globus Spirits Ltd., one of North India's leading alcohol manufacturers, delivered an impressive operational performance in Q3 FY26, with consolidated net profit surging 1,456.74% year-on-year to ₹21.95 crores from a meagre ₹1.41 crores in Q3 FY25. The stellar performance was driven by substantial margin expansion, with operating margins (excluding other income) improving to 8.99% from 4.65% in the corresponding quarter last year. The stock, trading at ₹1,068.30, has retreated 1.64% following the results announcement, presenting what appears to be an attractive entry opportunity for long-term investors in this ₹3,137 crore market capitalisation company. Time: 2 hours ago
